title: AIYRA
subTitle: B2B Product Inquiry & Showcase Website
description: A modern B2B platform for exploring products, saving favorites, and connecting with admin via Gemini AI chat, focusing on product showcasing, personalized engagement, and smooth admin-driven management

keyFeatures.title: AI-Powered Chat System
keyFeatures.feature: Integrated Gemini AI for real-time communication between users and admin.

keyFeatures.title: Advanced Admin Dashboard
keyFeatures.feature: Complete product management, blog updates, banner editing, and data analytics with Chart.js visualization.

keyFeatures.title: Smart Order & Inquiry System
keyFeatures.feature: Dynamic order form with Nodemailer integration for instant email notifications and manual order processing.

title: EduSpark
subTitle: online course management website
description: Students can enroll through a user-friendly interface with secure authentication. Solved Stripe and image hosting issues using online resources; planning to add JWT for better access control.

keyFeatures.title: User Friendly Interface
keyFeatures.feature: Easy to use and simple design helps everyone find what they want fast. Works smoothly on phones, tablets, and computers.

keyFeatures.title: Filtering & Searching
keyFeatures.feature: Users can filter courses by category and search by title to quickly find relevant content. This improves navigation and helps users access their desired courses more efficiently.

keyFeatures.title: Dynamic Dashboard
keyFeatures.feature: Provides separate dashboards for students, teachers, and admins, each with role-specific features and controls.

title: Car Doctor
subTitle: Car Servicing & Auto Parts Platform
description: Car Doctor is a modern, user-friendly platform connecting car owners with reliable services and auto parts, offering a seamless experience with secure authentication via NextAuth..

keyFeatures.title: Service Booking
keyFeatures.feature: Users can view detailed information of a specific car service, book the service, and update or delete their bookings.

keyFeatures.title: Service Management
keyFeatures.feature: Admins can add, update, and delete car service data efficiently.

keyFeatures.title: Secure Authentication
keyFeatures.feature: Authentication and user management implemented securely using NextAuth.

title: roadForge
subTitle: Roadmap & Feedback Platform
description: With a user-friendly interface and secure authentication, users can log in to upvote roadmap items and actively engage in discussions through comments and replies.

keyFeatures.title: Upvote Interaction
keyFeatures.feature: Users can upvote each roadmap item only once to express their support, helping prioritize the most valuable features.

keyFeatures.title: Threaded Commenting
keyFeatures.feature: Supports nested replies up to three levels, allowing users to engage in structured and meaningful discussions under each roadmap item.

keyFeatures.title: Filtering
keyFeatures.feature: Roadmap items can be filtered by status like 'Planned', 'In Progress , or 'Completed' to ensure better clarity and smoother navigation.

title: Go Marathon
subTitle: marathon management website
description: A responsive marathon management platform featuring event registration, real-time updates, and role-based dashboards for runners, organizers, and administrators.

keyFeatures.title: Event Registration
keyFeatures.feature: With secure authentication and a user-friendly interface, users can easily explore events and complete registration based on their preferences.

keyFeatures.title: Registration Deadline
keyFeatures.feature: Prevents registration once the event deadline has passed, ensuring timely participation and better event management.

keyFeatures.title: Dashboard
keyFeatures.feature: Role-based control panels for runners, organizers, and admins enabling smooth event management.

title: Dream Arc
subTitle: Crowd Funding Application
description: Crowdcube is a modern crowdfunding platform where users can explore campaigns, donate to causes, and manage their own campaigns effortlessly with secure authentication and real-time updates.

keyFeatures.title: Campaign Management
keyFeatures.feature: Users can add, update, and delete their campaigns, while admins can efficiently manage all campaigns.

keyFeatures.title: Donation Tracking
keyFeatures.feature: Users can donate to active campaigns, with contributions securely recorded and viewable in their personal dashboard.

keyFeatures.title: Secure Authentication
keyFeatures.feature: Login and registration system with email/password and optional social login, ensuring protected access to private routes.
